content.query:
--How many times did each family relationship occur
--Qn: where is the dict for (family_relationship)

USE woca_ldw
GO 

IF OBJECT_ID('gold.IndividualAgeGroupCount') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.IndividualAgeGroupCount
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.IndividualAgeGroupCount
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = woca_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/IndividualAgeGroupCount',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
    fm.family_relationship,
    COUNT(1) AS Counts
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE fm.family_relationship IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY fm.family_relationship
ORDER BY Counts DESC;
